concise_definition: n. 鞠躬, 绊索, 蝴蝶结; v. 鞠躬, 弯腰, 弹奏弦乐器

definitions.explanation_en: A gesture of bending the head or body forward as a sign of respect, greeting, or submission, often performed in formal or ceremonial contexts.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一种为表示尊敬、问候或顺从而低头或弯腰的姿态，常用于正式或仪式性场合。
definitions.example_en: The actor took a deep bow after the standing ovation.
definitions.example_cn: 在观众起立鼓掌后，演员深深鞠了一躬。

definitions.explanation_en: A knot made by tying a ribbon or string into two loops and two free ends, commonly used for decoration or fastening, such as on gifts or shoes.
definitions.explanation_cn: 用丝带或绳子打成的两个环和两个自由端组成的结，常用于装饰或系紧，如礼品包装或鞋带。
definitions.example_en: She tied a red bow on top of the gift box.
definitions.example_cn: 她在礼品盒顶部系了一个红色蝴蝶结。

definitions.explanation_en: A curved wooden instrument used to play stringed instruments such as the violin, cello, or double bass, typically made of horsehair stretched tightly across a stick.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一种用于演奏小提琴、大提琴或低音提琴等弦乐器的弯曲木制工具，通常由紧绷在木杆上的马尾毛制成。
definitions.example_en: The violinist drew the bow across the strings with great expression.
definitions.example_cn: 小提琴手用琴弓在琴弦上拉出富有表现力的旋律。

definitions.explanation_en: To bend the head or body forward as a gesture of respect, greeting, or submission.
definitions.explanation_cn: 以低头或弯腰的动作表示尊敬、问候或顺从。
definitions.example_en: He bowed to the audience before beginning his speech.
definitions.example_cn: 他在开始演讲前向观众鞠躬。

definitions.explanation_en: To play a stringed instrument using a bow, especially in classical music.
definitions.explanation_cn: 使用琴弓演奏弦乐器，尤指在古典音乐中。
definitions.example_en: She has been bowing the cello since she was five years old.
definitions.example_cn: 她五岁起就开始用琴弓拉大提琴。

comparison.analysis: “Curtsey”（屈膝礼）特指女性在正式场合行的屈膝下蹲礼节，与“bow”（鞠躬）在性别和动作形态上有所区别。虽然两者都表示尊敬，但“curtsey”是女性专属，而“bow”可为男女通用，且动作更偏向于前倾而非下蹲。
“Knot”（结）泛指任何将绳子、线等打结的形态，而“bow”特指一种对称的、带有两个环和两个自由端的装饰性结，如蝴蝶结。因此，“bow”是“knot”的一种子类型，具有特定的结构和用途。
“Arco”（用弓演奏）是音乐术语，专指用琴弓拉奏弦乐器，与“bow”作为名词或动词时的含义高度重合。但“arco”仅用于乐谱指示，是专业术语；而“bow”是日常语言中通用的词，既可作名词也可作动词，适用范围更广。
